reference.shortdesc:
Applicability: For Class A Devices intended to be sold in Brasil
THIS SECTION WILL HAVE TO BE UPDATED AT A LATER DATE
Translation: This equipment has no right to protection against harmful interference and cannot cause interference in duly authorized systems. Este equipamento não tem direito à proteção contra interferência prejudicial e não pode causar interferência em sistemas devidamente autorizados.

section.draft-comment: Applicability: For products tested for SAR at 0cm (with & without holster): Both Head and Body SAR values shall be added if applicable

Writers: Create your own version of this topic for your product. Conref in the content you need. For sections you need to edit, right click on them and select Replace reference with content. You must replace the reference with the content so that you can edit it. Then you can delete unneeded rows or columns.
If a single model value - use bulleted form.
If multiple models - Use the table format.

Translation: “This product is approved by Anatel in accordance with the regulated procedures for conformity assessment of telecommunications products and meets the applicable technical requirements, including the limits of the measurement of human exposure relating to electric, magnetic and electromagnetic fields of radio frequency"
SAR values measured:
Head: XX W / kg
Body: XX W / kg

section.p: Este produto está homologado pela Anatel de acordo com os procedimentos regulamentados para avaliação da conformidade de produtos para telecomunicações e atende aos requisitos técnicos aplicáveis, incluindo os limites da medida da exposição humana referente a campos elétricos, magnéticos e eletromagnéticos de radiofrequência

section.draft-comment:
Formatting suggestion: If these values could use one format, instead of choosing from bullets or table, then writers could reuse the whole topic and not have to make a copy of it. Maybe bullets with a comma separated list:
Model1: XX, Head: xx W/kg, Body: xx W/kg
Model2: XX, Head: xx W/kg, Body: xx W/kg
Translation: This device complies with the Radio Frequency Exposure Guidelines when positioned at least XX cm from the body.
section.p: Este dispositivo está em conformidade com as diretrizes de exposição a radiofrequência quando posicionado à pelo menos cm do corpo.
